SQLDataSource.Author: IFS RnD
SQLDataSource.Name: IND_SHIPMENT_MANAGEMENT_LINES_ATTACHED_TO_HANDLING_UNITS
SQLDataSource.Where: NVL(&AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.GET_COMPANY(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_CONTRACT(SHIPMENT_ID)),'%')= NVL('$COMPANY$','%')AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_CONTRACT(SHIPMENT_ID),'%')= '$SITE$' AND('$STATUS$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_STATE(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A')= '$STATUS$'))AND('$RECEIVER_ID$' IS NULL OR(NVL(receiver_id,'%')= '$RECEIVER_ID$'))AND('$NEXT_STEP$' IS NULL OR(NVL(NVL(&AO.Shipment_Flow_API.Get_Next_Step(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A'),'%')= '$NEXT_STEP$'))AND('$SHIPMENT_TYPE$' IS NULL OR(NVL(shipment_type,'%')= '$SHIPMENT_TYPE$'))AND('$FORWARDER$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_FORWARD_AGENT_ID(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A')= '$FORWARDER$'))AND('$ROUTE$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_ROUTE_ID(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A')= '$ROUTE$'))AND('$DELIVERY_TERMS$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_DELIVERY_TERMS(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A')= '$DELIVERY_TERMS$'))AND('$SHIP_VIA$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_SHIP_VIA_CODE(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A')= '$SHIP_VIA$'))AND('$SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR(SHIPMENT_ID = '$SHIPMENT_ID$'))AND('$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR(NVL(TO_CHAR(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_PARENT_CONSOL_SHIPMENT_ID(SHIPMENT_ID)),'N/A')= '$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$'))
